author: Cindy Johnson

review: It's a great idea, and when it works it's awesome, but it constantly drops the wireless signal, even though my router is right on the other side of the living room (and I have the upgraded comcast internet speed.) I'm going to buy the $99 plug-in model instead, to see if that doesn't get rid of the constant buffering and dropped signals.If not for the constant wireless issues, I'd give it 4 stars. Prime content needs to be a little better. It seems like 60% of their Prime content is infomerical and B-movie garbage. Not bad enough for 3 stars, but not good enough for 5, certainly.
author: David Monteith

review: I am very very pleased with this. It supports everything that I watch streaming and already pre setup for my Amazon account! I only wish it were HARDER for little hands to purchase content. When easy is too easy. I wish it came with the better remote, oh well. I don't play games so I cant comment on how well it performs in that aspect.
